translated: Serving it is entering the city of nirvana.

original: de sgrub par byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yod do //
translated: It accomplishes that, and the Perfection of Wisdom itself exists.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa byed par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod pa kho na ste /
translated: The one who has become one who listens to, takes up, etc. the perfection of wisdom in the presence of the Tathagata is one who is engaged in the activities in the presence of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na gnas pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas mthong ba la sogs pa la don las yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na gnas pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas mthong ba la sogs pa la don las yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the activities in the presence of the Tathagata, such as seeing the Buddha, etc. are meaningful.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la dngos su gsan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal gyi zhal de nyid las 'byung ba'i ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma bstan pa
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la dngos su gsan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal gyi zhal de nyid las 'byung ba'i ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma bstan pa
translated: Thus, the great bodhisattva Vajrapani, having directly heard from the Blessed One, having collected the collection of names, collection of words, and collection of letters that arise from the very face of the Blessed One's glory,

original: bsdus nas rdzogs pa gsal bar mdzad cing gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: bsdus nas rdzogs pa gsal bar mdzad cing gsungs pa ni /
translated: he illuminated and spoke the complete [text] without teaching the Blessed One.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus have I heard and so on.

original: de skad ces zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'o //
analyzed: de skad ces zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'o //
translated: Thus refers to the perfection of wisdom sutra.

original: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The phrase the Blessed One said means he spoke.

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i sku'o //
translated: The phrase the Blessed One refers to the Tathāgata's enjoyment body and transformation body.

original: de lta na yang gzhung 'grel las de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
analyzed: de lta na yang gzhung 'grel las de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i sku dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
translated: However, in the commentary to the text, it says: The Tathāgata's transformation body, surrounded by monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen, resides in Rājagṛha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs so //
translated: The Tathāgata's enjoyment body, together with a retinue of bodhisattvas, resides in the Land of Bliss.

original: 'khor gcig nyid las la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las chos bstan pa 'byung ba shes te /
analyzed: 'khor gcig nyid las la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku las chos bstan pa 'byung ba shes te /
translated: The bodhisattvas who are engaged in the one assembly know that the teaching of the Dharma arises from the enjoyment body,

original: de rnams las gzhan pa ni sprul pa'i sku las so //
analyzed: de rnams las gzhan pa ni sprul pa'i sku las so //
translated: but those other than them know that it arises from the transformation body.

original: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rnam par grol ba rnams shes pa de rnams sku gnyis po las kyang shes pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rnam par grol ba rnams shes pa de rnams sku gnyis po las kyang shes pa yin no //
translated: Those who are many great bodhisattvas who are disciples of the Bhagavat, who are liberated, know both bodies.

original: slob @316b dpon rnams kyis 'di skad du brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: slob @316b dpon rnams kyis 'di skad du brjod pa yin te /
translated: The masters say this:

original: sa rnams thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba bsnyen pa rnams bsten pa yin te /
analyzed: sa rnams thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba bsnyen pa rnams bsten pa yin te /
translated: The bodhisattvas who have attained the stages are disciples of the Bhagavat’s beatific body, who are devoted to the highest joy and delight.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid las chos ston pa thos nas de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa grub pa yin te sprul pa'i sku las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nyid las chos ston pa thos nas de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa grub pa yin te sprul pa'i sku las ni ma yin no //
translated: Having heard the teaching of the Dharma from the beatific body itself, they accomplish the full evolution of the qualities of buddhahood, not from the emanation body.

original: de bas na de rnams sprul pa'i sku la chos bstan pa dang nyan pa'i don du nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: de bas na de rnams sprul pa'i sku la chos bstan pa dang nyan pa'i don du nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: Therefore, they do not approach the emanation body in order to hear the teaching of the Dharma.

original: gzhan dag ni de rnams kyi 'khor dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mthong pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku nyid mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni de rnams kyi 'khor dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mthong pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku nyid mthong ba yin no //
translated: The others, who are not fortunate enough to see the Enjoyment Body of those Buddhas, see only the Transformation Body.

original: de bas na theg pa chen po bstan pa thams cad la sku gnyis kyis bstan pa zhes de bas na yang gzhung 'grel las 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje sdud pa po zhes legs par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na theg pa chen po bstan pa thams cad la sku gnyis kyis bstan pa zhes de bas na yang gzhung 'grel las 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje sdud pa po zhes legs par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in all the teachings of the Great Vehicle, the teaching is said to be by the two Bodies. Thus, in the commentary, it is well said that the noble Vajrapani is the compiler.

original: nyan thos ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bstan pa mi shes shing bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ci zhig mjug bsdu ba yin /
analyzed: nyan thos ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bstan pa mi shes shing bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ci zhig mjug bsdu ba yin /
translated: The Sravakas do not know the teaching of the Enjoyment Body. What is the conclusion of the statement of the Blessed One, “When the Blessed One had said this”?

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang gzhung 'grel las log pa'i gzhan rnams kyi bshad pa gzung bya ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang gzhung 'grel las log pa'i gzhan rnams kyi bshad pa gzung bya ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Similarly, in the commentary, the explanation of the others, who are mistaken, should not be accepted.

original: gang gi phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen mdo sde lnga brgya bshad pa'i phyir 'phags pa mgon po byams pas bka' stsal pa de bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen mdo sde lnga brgya bshad pa'i phyir 'phags pa mgon po byams pas bka' stsal pa de bas na /
translated: Because Master Vasubandhu was instructed by noble Maitreya to explain five hundred sūtras,

original: ci ltar phyin ci log tu bshad pa mdzad /
analyzed: ci ltar phyin ci log tu bshad pa mdzad /
translated: how could he explain them in a distorted way?

original: bla ma'i man ngag las gzhung 'grel gnod 'joms gsal por bya bar 'dod /
analyzed: bla ma'i man ngag las gzhung 'grel gnod 'joms gsal por bya bar 'dod /
translated: He wishes to clarify the commentary on the treatise through the guru's instructions.

original: ces bya ba bshad pa'i 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhal snga nas nyid kyi man ngag la skyabs su byed do //
analyzed: ces bya ba bshad pa'i 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhal snga nas nyid kyi man ngag la skyabs su byed do //
translated: Thus, he takes refuge in the personal instructions of noble Asanga himself.

original: de'i zhabs kyang chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa dngos su 'phags pa mgon po byams pa las theg pa chen po dang mgon pos mdzad pa'i dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams gsan par mdzad ces bya ba shin tu
analyzed: de'i zhabs kyang chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa dngos su 'phags pa mgon po byams pa las theg pa chen po dang mgon pos mdzad pa'i dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams gsan par mdzad ces bya ba shin tu
translated: And his feet were blessed by the samadhi of the stream of Dharma, and he actually received the Mahayana and treatises composed by the protector such as the Madhyantavibhāga from noble protector Maitreya.

original: yang grags pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang grags pa nyid do //
translated: This is very well known.

original: 'phags pa thogs med kyi mos pa'i dbang gis mgon po'i bstan @317a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa thogs med kyi mos pa'i dbang gis mgon po'i bstan @317a * //
translated: By the power of noble Asanga's devotion, the protector

original: pa de drang ba'i don zhes bya ba brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pa de drang ba'i don zhes bya ba brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: and it cannot be said that it is interpretable in meaning.

original: mdo yi de nyid don bsdus pa //
analyzed: mdo yi de nyid don bsdus pa //
translated: The meaning of the scriptures is summarized in reality.

original: bstan pa ring du gnas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bstan pa ring du gnas pa'i phyir //
translated: In order that the teaching may endure long,

original: mdo yi nges don drang don gyi //
analyzed: mdo yi nges don drang don gyi //
translated: the definitive meaning of the scriptures and the interpretable meaning

original: rnam 'byed des ni byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam 'byed des ni byed par 'gyur //
translated: will be distinguished by this treatise.

original: zhes bya ba 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhabs lung bstan pa thob pa'i phyir //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las 'phags pa thogs med kyi zhabs lung bstan pa thob pa'i phyir //
translated: Thus, it is said in the Manjusrimula-tantra that the venerable Asanga received a prophecy.

original: de bas na mgon po byams pas nges pa'i don nyid du de rnams la bstan pa mdzad pa dang de'i zhal snga nas kyis kyang bstan bcos rnams la nges par 'grel pa zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na mgon po byams pas nges pa'i don nyid du de rnams la bstan pa mdzad pa dang de'i zhal snga nas kyis kyang bstan bcos rnams la nges par 'grel pa zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the Lord Maitreya taught it as the ultimate truth, and it should be understood that he also composed the treatises called the “commentaries on the ultimate.”

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi bzhed pa las de ni 'gal ba ma yin te gang gi phyir 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi bstan bcos rnams la gang zhig rnam par shes pa la kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid bshad pa de
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi bzhed pa las de ni 'gal ba ma yin te gang gi phyir 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi bstan bcos rnams la gang zhig rnam par shes pa la kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid bshad pa de
translated: It is not contradictory to the position of the venerable Nagarjuna, because in the treatises of the venerable Nagarjuna, whatever is explained as conventionally existent in consciousness

original: nyid dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams la yang dgongs pa gzhan gyi don dam pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽yongs su 'gyur ba med pa nyid de rnams kyi de dang der bshad pa la nye bar dmigs nas sngar nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: nyid dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i bstan bcos rnams la yang dgongs pa gzhan gyi don dam pa zhes bya ba'o // yongs su 'gyur ba med pa nyid de rnams kyi de dang der bshad pa la nye bar dmigs nas sngar nyid du bstan to //
translated: And in the treatises Madhyamakaśāstra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of both, i.e., of the Sūtras and of the treatises.🔽And in the treatises Yuktiṣaṣṭikā, etc., the intention is the ultimate of neither, i.e., of neither the Sūtras nor of the treatises.

original: gzhung 'grel las kyang rang gi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung 'grel las kyang rang gi bshad pa'o //
translated: And in the treatises Paramārthaviniścaya, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the ultimate of the Sūtras, etc.🔽And in the treatises Madhyamakāvatāra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the ultimate of the ultimate of the Sūtras, etc.🔽And in the treatises Madhyamakaśāstra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the Sūtras, etc.🔽And in the treatises Madhyamakaśāstra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the Sūtras, etc.

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis tshig le'ur byas pa de dang der dngos su bris nas tshad mar byed pa de bas na 'phags pa'i bzhed pa dang 'gal bar smra bar nus pa ma yin no //🔽gang yang 'phags pas gsungs pa /🔽lta ba'i phol skyes pa zhes bya ba de yang dbu ma pa'i dgongs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis tshig le'ur byas pa de dang der dngos su bris nas tshad mar byed pa de bas na 'phags pa'i bzhed pa dang 'gal bar smra bar nus pa ma yin no // gang yang 'phags pas gsungs pa / lta ba'i phol skyes pa zhes bya ba de yang dbu ma pa'i dgongs pa ma yin te /
translated: And in the treatises Madhyamakaśāstra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the Sūtras, etc.🔽And in the treatises Madhyamakaśāstra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the Sūtras, etc.

original: slob dpon ni dbus su dbu ma pa rang gi gzhung rnams nyid kyis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon ni dbus su dbu ma pa rang gi gzhung rnams nyid kyis bstan pa'o //
translated: And in the treatises Madhyamakaśāstra, etc., the intention is the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate of the ultimate, i.e., of the

original: rnam par rig pa tsam la ma zhen par bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho 'dzin par mi nus pa de bas na ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems tsam nyid ston pa de bzhin du 'phags pa rnams kyi 'ga' zhig tu'o
analyzed: rnam par rig pa tsam la ma zhen par bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho 'dzin par mi nus pa de bas na ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sems tsam nyid ston pa de bzhin du 'phags pa rnams kyi 'ga' zhig tu'o
translated: Without clinging to mere awareness, one cannot grasp the ocean of the Lord’s emptiness of all dharmas. Therefore, just as the Lord taught mind-only, so also the Aryas did in some places.

original: // de bstan pa yang rnam par shes par smra ba nyid ni drang ba'i don kho na'o //
analyzed: // de bstan pa yang rnam par shes par smra ba nyid ni drang ba'i don kho na'o //
translated: That teaching is interpretable in meaning, because vijnapti-vada is not renowned as ultimate.

original: rnam par shes pa don dam du yod pa zhes gang du yang ma grags @317b pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa don dam du yod pa zhes gang du yang ma grags @317b pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is not renowned anywhere that consciousness exists ultimately.

original: de yi de nyid don dam yang //
analyzed: de yi de nyid don dam yang //
translated: And that reality is ultimate

original: de bzhin nyid ni rdzas su 'dod //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni rdzas su 'dod //
translated: Suchness is accepted as a substance.

original: de ni bden pa mi bslu ba //
analyzed: de ni bden pa mi bslu ba //
translated: It is truth, not deceptive.

original: de rtogs pa las sangs rgyas brjod //
analyzed: de rtogs pa las sangs rgyas brjod //
translated: From the realization of that, one is called a Buddha.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pas don dam par yod pa'i stong pa nyid ston par mdzad pa dang / med ces bya ba chad lta'o /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pas don dam par yod pa'i stong pa nyid ston par mdzad pa dang / med ces bya ba chad lta'o /
translated: Thus, he taught emptiness, which is ultimate existence, and he taught the view of annihilation, which is the view that “it does not exist.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par mdzad pa'i 'phags pa nyid kyis sun phyung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par mdzad pa'i 'phags pa nyid kyis sun phyung ba'o //
translated: and so on, and the noble Nāgārjuna himself refuted them.

original: de'i slad du slob dpon gyis kyang lta ba'i phol skyes pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de'i slad du slob dpon gyis kyang lta ba'i phol skyes pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the master [Candrakīrti] also calls them “those with the boil of views.”

original: des na nang gi shes bya la brten nas //
analyzed: des na nang gi shes bya la brten nas //
translated: Thus, based on inner knowable objects,

original: dbyig gnyen gyis ni rnam par bkrol //
analyzed: dbyig gnyen gyis ni rnam par bkrol //
translated: Vasubandhu has explained them.

original: zhes bya ba sun phyung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba sun phyung ba'o //
translated: This is the refutation.

original: rtog ge ba rnams ni 'phags pa rnams kyi gzhung dang don dag las yongs su bsgyur bar byas nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gnas pa'i gzhung rnams kha cig rnam par shes pa'i tshul nyid kyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rtog ge ba rnams ni 'phags pa rnams kyi gzhung dang don dag las yongs su bsgyur bar byas nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gnas pa'i gzhung rnams kha cig rnam par shes pa'i tshul nyid kyis bshad pa'o //
translated: Logicians, having distorted the texts and meanings of the noble ones, explain some of the texts of the Pāramitā system as being just the Vijñapti system.

original: gang gi rtsa ba can 'di brdzun pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ni rnam par shes par smra ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten pas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi rtsa ba can 'di brdzun pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ni rnam par shes par smra ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten pas brjod pa'o //
translated: The root of this is the Pāramitā system, which is called Vijñānavāda by worldly people.

original: rtog ge ba de rnams nyid kyi 'dod pa rnams slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyis dbu ma la 'jug pa las sun phyung ba ste /
analyzed: rtog ge ba de rnams nyid kyi 'dod pa rnams slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas kyis dbu ma la 'jug pa las sun phyung ba ste /
translated: The master Candrakirti refutes the assertions of those logicians in the Madhyamakavatara.

original: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ni sun 'byin pa la yin te /
analyzed: don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ni sun 'byin pa la yin te /
translated: The paramita system of the ultimate is the refutation.

original: de dngos su rang nyid kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dngos su rang nyid kyis kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they actually assert that themselves.

original: gzhan du na 'phags pa rnams kyang drang don ston par mdzad pas 'dod pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba de bas na bstan pa nyid la ma 'brel ba chen por 'gyur ro /
analyzed: gzhan du na 'phags pa rnams kyang drang don ston par mdzad pas 'dod pa tha dad pa zhes bya ba de bas na bstan pa nyid la ma 'brel ba chen por 'gyur ro /
translated: Otherwise, since even the Aryas would be teaching the interpretable meaning, there would be a great lack of connection with the teaching, since they would be called those of different desires.

original: de rnams la dgongs nas 'di gsungs te /
analyzed: de rnams la dgongs nas 'di gsungs te /
translated: With those in mind, this was said:

original: gnas brtan chos skyong la sogs pa rnams bstan bcos rnams kyi mdzad pa po de rnams kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid yongs su 'dor ba ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas brtan chos skyong la sogs pa rnams bstan bcos rnams kyi mdzad pa po de rnams kyis kyang stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid yongs su 'dor ba ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Even those who are the authors of the treatises, the sthaviras Dharmapala and so on, do not abandon the reality of emptiness.

original: dgyes shing zhes bya ba ni yid gzung ba'o //
analyzed: dgyes shing zhes bya ba ni yid gzung ba'o //
translated: Delighted is a mental retention.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi bstan pa'i don 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi bstan pa'i don 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the disciples who uphold the meaning of the teaching.

original: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la don yod pa nyid du bstan par mdzad do //
analyzed: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la don yod pa nyid du bstan par mdzad do //
translated: This shows that the teaching of the Tathagata is not in vain.

original: nyan pa po rnams kyis ci zhig byas zhes gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: nyan pa po rnams kyis ci zhig byas zhes gsungs pa ni /
translated: What did the listeners do?

original: mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: They praised it.

original: mngon par zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon du 'gro ba'i bstod pa'i sgra 'di ni las dang bcas pa bsngags pa'i don no //
analyzed: mngon par zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon du 'gro ba'i bstod pa'i sgra 'di ni las dang bcas pa bsngags pa'i don no //
translated: The word abhi, which is placed in front of the word praise, means to praise with action.

original: @318a * // nyan pa po de rnams kyang gang yin zhe na gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: @318a * // nyan pa po de rnams kyang gang yin zhe na gsungs pa ni /
translated: What were the listeners like?

original: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Maitreya and so on, the Bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: The Bodhisattvas praised the speech of the Bhagavat, the Body of Complete Enjoyment.

original: gzhan dag ni sprul pa'i sku'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni sprul pa'i sku'i'o //
translated: Others praised the speech of the Emanation Body.

original: 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi tshogs te mi'i 'jig rten du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi tshogs te mi'i 'jig rten du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The world is the multitude of beings, because the teaching is for the human world.

original: mi'i tshogs nyid ces bya ba'i khyad par du ma gyur cig / de bas na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mi'i tshogs nyid ces bya ba'i khyad par du ma gyur cig / de bas na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, together with the gods, humans, demigods, and gandharvas,🔽the bodhisattvas and the world of gods, etc.,

original: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dang lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten de dang zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bsdu ba'o zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dang lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten de dang zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bsdu ba'o zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i don la'o //
translated: are included.

original: 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par byang pa'i rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams las ring du song bas na 'phags pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par byang pa'i rang bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams las ring du song bas na 'phags pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Noble means that which has gone far from the dharmas of affliction by the nature of purification, which is the essence of the teaching that is the outflow of the dharma-dhātu.

original: stong phrag brgyad du bsdus pas na brgyad stong pa'o //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad du bsdus pas na brgyad stong pa'o //
translated: Eight Thousand means that it is included in eight thousand.

original: 'di ltar brgyad stong pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar brgyad stong pa 'di ni /
translated: Thus, this Eight Thousand

original: ci ltar gsungs pa'i don gyi tshad ces bya ba'o //🔽ming la ka na byas pas brgyad stong pa'o //
analyzed: ci ltar gsungs pa'i don gyi tshad ces bya ba'o // ming la ka na byas pas brgyad stong pa'o //
translated: is the measure of the meaning as it is taught.

original: 'phags pa yang yin la /
analyzed: 'phags pa yang yin la /
translated: It is called Eight Thousand because it is made of syllables.🔽It is noble because it is the cause of the dharma-dhātu.

original: brgyad stong pa yang yin pas na 'phags pa brgyad stong pa'o //
analyzed: brgyad stong pa yang yin pas na 'phags pa brgyad stong pa'o //
translated: It is the Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines, and so it is the Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines.

original: de la yongs su gtad pa 'di la kun nas bskor bas na yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste rdzogs pa ni yang dag par thob pa mthar thug par byas pa zhes bya ba yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: de la yongs su gtad pa 'di la kun nas bskor bas na yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste rdzogs pa ni yang dag par thob pa mthar thug par byas pa zhes bya ba yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: Here, the chapter is called “Entrusting” because it is surrounded by entrusting. “ Completion” means “having brought to a final conclusion the attainment of perfection.”

original: // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa /
analyzed: // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi rgyud kyi khyad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs par mdzad pa de bas
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed par mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi rgyud kyi khyad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs par mdzad pa de bas
translated: The phrase “the one who gives birth to all the Tathagatas” means that the perfection of wisdom itself, which is the special feature of the mindstreams of sentient beings, is the one who gives birth to the Tathagatas, because it has the nature of the knowledge of all things.

original: na / sangs rgyas skyed par mdzad pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: na / sangs rgyas skyed par mdzad pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa zhes brjod do //
translated: When that is understood, it is called “the one who gives birth to all the Tathagatas,” because it has the nature of the Dharma that gives birth to the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba ni lam shes kyi ngo bo nyid rgyud kha cig rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid du mdzad pa'i phyir de rnams kyi yum zhes brjod
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba ni lam shes kyi ngo bo nyid rgyud kha cig rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid du mdzad pa'i phyir de rnams kyi yum zhes brjod
translated: The mother of all the Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, Sravakas, and Pratyekabuddhas is the essence of the knowledge of the path, because in some Tantras it is made into the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas themselves, and therefore it is called their mother.

original: do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa ni skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ba zhes brjod @318b pa ;
analyzed: do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa ni skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ba zhes brjod @318b pa ;
translated: The teaching of the Perfection of Wisdom is said to be common to all people.

original: des na rang rgyal ba dang nyan thos rnams kyi yang yum mo //
analyzed: des na rang rgyal ba dang nyan thos rnams kyi yang yum mo //
translated: Therefore it is also the mother of the Pratyekabuddhas and Sravakas.

original: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni chos ni bstan pa'i chos so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni chos ni bstan pa'i chos so //
translated: The seal of all dharmas is the Dharma of the teaching.

original: de'i phyag rgya ni rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya ni rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Its seal is the seal of the Dharma.

original: 'di las lhag pa'i bstan pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di las lhag pa'i bstan pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is the seal of the Dharma because there is no teaching higher than this.

original: yang na 'di theg pa thams cad pa de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'di nyid de /
analyzed: yang na 'di theg pa thams cad pa de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'di nyid de /
translated: Or else, it is the vehicle of all vehicles, and therefore it is the Dharma of the Lord himself.

original: gang zhig 'dis chos kyi rgyal po bstan pa'i phyag rgya ltar rgyas btab pa de bas na chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dis chos kyi rgyal po bstan pa'i phyag rgya ltar rgyas btab pa de bas na chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: It is the Dharma-mudra because it is sealed with the Dharma-mudra of the King of Dharma.

original: chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba ni chos rnams thams cad la ci lta ba bzhin du gsal bar mdzad pas na chos kyi sgron ma'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba ni chos rnams thams cad la ci lta ba bzhin du gsal bar mdzad pas na chos kyi sgron ma'o //
translated: It is the Dharma-torch because it illuminates all dharmas as they are.

original: chos kyi lte ba zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' yongs su spangs pas chos kyi lus la dbus su gyur pa de bas na chos kyi lte ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi lte ba zhes bya ba ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' yongs su spangs pas chos kyi lus la dbus su gyur pa de bas na chos kyi lte ba'o //
translated: It is the Dharma-navel because it is the center of the Dharma-body, since it is free from the extremes of superimposition and denial.

original: chos kyi rnga zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'khor rnams la 'di nyid bstan pas na bstan pa'i sgra rnams kyis phyogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos kyi rnga bo che'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rnga zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'khor rnams la 'di nyid bstan pas na bstan pa'i sgra rnams kyis phyogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos kyi rnga bo che'o //
translated: It is the Dharma-drum because it is the great Dharma-drum, since the sound of the teaching fills all directions by the teaching of all Buddhas to their retinues in all directions.

original: chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba ni ci ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i phyogs gang gis 'khor lo rin po che 'gro ba de nyid kyis stobs kyi tshogs thams cad kyang 'gro ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa
analyzed: chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba ni ci ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i phyogs gang gis 'khor lo rin po che 'gro ba de nyid kyis stobs kyi tshogs thams cad kyang 'gro ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa
translated: In the same way, the twelve branches of the scriptures of the buddhas

original: bcom ldan 'das ma gang gis gshegs pa'i phyogs de nyid kyis gshegs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma gang gis gshegs pa'i phyogs de nyid kyis gshegs te /
translated: move in the direction in which the Blessed Lady moves.

original: de bas na chos kyi tshul lo //
analyzed: de bas na chos kyi tshul lo //
translated: Therefore, it is the way of Dharma.

original: chos rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba ni chos rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos rin po che'i gter zhes bya ba ni chos rnams sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The term “treasure of the precious Dharma” means that the dharmas of the buddhas are the ten powers and so forth.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The dharmas of the bodhisattvas are the mind of enlightenment and so forth.

original: nyan thos rnams kye byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rnams so ;
analyzed: nyan thos rnams kye byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rnams so ;
translated: The dharmas of the śrāvakas are the factors of enlightenment and so forth.

original: ; de dag chos gzhan rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir rin po che ste /
analyzed: ; de dag chos gzhan rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir rin po che ste /
translated: They are precious because they are superior to other dharmas.

original: de rnams kyi 'di ni gter te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'di ni gter te /
translated: This is their treasure.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma nyid kyi thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas thams cad du thub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma nyid kyi thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas thams cad du thub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the Blessed Lady is invincible in every way by the stages of listening, reflection, and meditation.

original: chos kyi mdzod ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa gang zhig de ni bcom ldan 'das mas bsdus pa de bas na /
analyzed: chos kyi mdzod ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa gang zhig de ni bcom ldan 'das mas bsdus pa de bas na /
translated: The Dharma treasury is the teaching of the Dharma by the Buddhas, which is included in the Blessed Lady.

original: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod do //
analyzed: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod do //
translated: Therefore, this is the Dharma treasury of the Tathagatas.

original: mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan par gyur pa yang zad pa med pa de bas na mi zad pa'o //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar ba mthong ba skar ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan par gyur pa yang zad pa med pa de bas na mi zad pa'o // bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar ba mthong ba skar ma'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is inexhaustible because it is the teaching of all the Buddhas at all times, and it is inexhaustible.🔽The chapter called “The Appearance of the Inconceivable Marvel”

original: @319a * // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ngo mtshar ba mthong ba gang la yod pa de yang yin la skar ma'i phreng ba yang yin te zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: @319a * // bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ngo mtshar ba mthong ba gang la yod pa de yang yin la skar ma'i phreng ba yang yin te zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: is so called because it is the appearance of the inconceivable and marvelous.

original: chos gsung rab kyi phung po'i rgyan du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir skar ma'i phreng ba dang 'dra bas na bcom ldan 'das ma skar ma'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: chos gsung rab kyi phung po'i rgyan du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir skar ma'i phreng ba dang 'dra bas na bcom ldan 'das ma skar ma'i phreng ba'o //
translated: Since it is an ornament of the corpus of the Dharma, the scriptures, it is like a garland of stars, and so it is called the Blessed Lady, the Garland of Stars.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mu tig dang rin po che rnams kyis brtsam pa'i tshogs kyi khyad par ni skar ma'i phreng ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mu tig dang rin po che rnams kyis brtsam pa'i tshogs kyi khyad par ni skar ma'i phreng ba zhes brjod do //
translated: A garland of stars is said to be a special collection of extremely pure pearls and jewels.

original: bde ba thams cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
translated: The cause of all happiness means that all happiness is mundane and supramundane.

original: de rnams kyi rgyu ni skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyu ni skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: Its cause is that which generates it.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since the Blessed Lady, the Garland of Stars, generates all perfections through the perfections of retention and so forth, it is called the cause of all happiness.

original: rdzogs so zhes bya ba la dang gi sgra ni 'dus pa dang le'u yongs su rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: rdzogs so zhes bya ba la dang gi sgra ni 'dus pa dang le'u yongs su rdzogs pa la'o //
translated: It is completed means that the collection and the chapter are completed.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa 'di rdzogs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba'i zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa 'di rdzogs so //
translated: This commentary called Following the Explanation of the Meaning of the Words of the Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines is complete.🔽From the ocean of the perfect limit, difficult to fathom,

original: gting dpag dka' zhing yang dag mtha' yi rgya mtsho las ni ngo mtshar ba yi spros pa kun gyi rlabs //
analyzed: gting dpag dka' zhing yang dag mtha' yi rgya mtsho las ni ngo mtshar ba yi spros pa kun gyi rlabs //
translated: the waves of all the amazing elaborations

original: phung po zhes bya ba lhan cig 'byung ba'i mi mnyam ma rig rlung gis kun nas bskyod pa las //
analyzed: phung po zhes bya ba lhan cig 'byung ba'i mi mnyam ma rig rlung gis kun nas bskyod pa las //
translated: arise from the wind of the unequaled co-arisen ignorance called aggregates.

original: zhi bas de dang lhan cig nyid du thim par 'gyur te thugs su chud pa gang rnams kyis //
analyzed: zhi bas de dang lhan cig nyid du thim par 'gyur te thugs su chud pa gang rnams kyis //
translated: Through peace, they dissolve right there, for those who understand.🔽Those who have drunk this nectar of the Sage's teachings,

original: thub pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi 'di ni 'thungs te shin tu ring bar pha rol nyams pa rnams //
analyzed: thub pa'i bstan pa bdud rtsi 'di ni 'thungs te shin tu ring bar pha rol nyams pa rnams //
translated: having gone very far, are beyond decline.🔽Whatever I have seen in the commentaries, in the Perfection of Wisdom literature,🔽in the Middle Way of the noble Nagarjuna,

original: gang zhig gzhung 'grel dang ni pha rol phyin tshul dang // gang zhig 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi yang dbu ma dang // don bsdus dang ni dri ba rnam par nges pa las //
analyzed: gang zhig gzhung 'grel dang ni pha rol phyin tshul dang // gang zhig 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi yang dbu ma dang // don bsdus dang ni dri ba rnam par nges pa las //
translated: in the Compendium of Principles, and in the Determination of Questions,

original: gang zhig gzhan yang mthong ba de las bdag gis bris //
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan yang mthong ba de las bdag gis bris //
translated: from that I have written.

original: gang zhig nga rgyal gyis 'brel gsung rab 'chad par byed pa'i don de rnams la nyer brtags na //🔽'bar ba'i dmyal bar bskal pa dpag tu med par rang nyid kyis ni lce dang mgrin pa la //
analyzed: gang zhig nga rgyal gyis 'brel gsung rab 'chad par byed pa'i don de rnams la nyer brtags na // 'bar ba'i dmyal bar bskal pa dpag tu med par rang nyid kyis ni lce dang mgrin pa la //
translated: If one examines the meaning of the scriptures that are taught by those who are connected with pride,🔽In the blazing hell, for countless eons, with one's own tongue and throat,

original: gshin rje'i bu rnams tshal rno ba'i phur pas btsan thabs kyis ni brgya phrag yang dang yang //
analyzed: gshin rje'i bu rnams tshal rno ba'i phur pas btsan thabs kyis ni brgya phrag yang dang yang //
translated: The sons of Yama, with sharp-pointed spears, forcibly and repeatedly

original: rgyang grags gnyis gnyis lag pa gnyis kyis khro ba dang ni 'gril bas 'bigs par yang ni byed //
analyzed: rgyang grags gnyis gnyis lag pa gnyis kyis khro ba dang ni 'gril bas 'bigs par yang ni byed //
translated: Pierce hundreds of times with anger and rolling with both hands two krośas apart.

original: thub pa rgyal po'i bstan 'dzin rtse mor gyur pa 'phags pa thogs med de ni gang du gshegs //
analyzed: thub pa rgyal po'i bstan 'dzin rtse mor gyur pa 'phags pa thogs med de ni gang du gshegs //
translated: Where did the noble Asanga, the supreme upholder of the teachings of the Sage, go?

original: gang du slob dpon dbyig gnyen long ba'i mun par mchog gi nyi ma'i gnyen ni rab skyes pa //
analyzed: gang du slob dpon dbyig gnyen long ba'i mun par mchog gi nyi ma'i gnyen ni rab skyes pa //
translated: Where did the master Vasubandhu, the supreme friend of the sun, arise in the darkness of blindness?

original: gang dag gis ni de ltar lam drang mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrod cing nyer bgrod spangs gyur pas //
analyzed: gang dag gis ni de ltar lam drang mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrod cing nyer bgrod spangs gyur pas //
translated: Where did those who thus skillfully traversed the path, the wise ones who have abandoned attachment, go?

original: dam pa'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba las dang bral ba rnams kyi don du dka' @319b bas byas //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba las dang bral ba rnams kyi don du dka' @319b bas byas //
translated: For the sake of those who are deprived of the holy Dharma, I have made this difficult work.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni mi 'dra thub pa'i dam pa chos kyi sku //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni mi 'dra thub pa'i dam pa chos kyi sku //
translated: This perfection of wisdom, the nature of the excellent Sage's Dharma body,

original: legs par bshad pa brjod par 'byung phyir bdag gis bsngags pa dang bcas rgyas par byas pa las //
analyzed: legs par bshad pa brjod par 'byung phyir bdag gis bsngags pa dang bcas rgyas par byas pa las //
translated: I have praised and elaborated upon, so that the good explanation may be expressed.

original: byas pa shes pa rnams kyis gus byas 'di ni bsrung bya ba thal sbyar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: byas pa shes pa rnams kyis gus byas 'di ni bsrung bya ba thal sbyar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
translated: I pray with folded hands that those who know what has been done will respectfully preserve this.

original: ston pa'i bstan pa 'khrul pa khrel yin ba ste bdag nyid gcig pu yis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ston pa'i bstan pa 'khrul pa khrel yin ba ste bdag nyid gcig pu yis ni ma yin no //
translated: The Teacher's teaching is not a mistake, it is not just my own.

original: gang gi kun nas rtsod pa rnams la pha rol phyogs kyi mtha'i //
analyzed: gang gi kun nas rtsod pa rnams la pha rol phyogs kyi mtha'i //
translated: In all disputes, the belly of the opponent's position

original: lto ba khengs pa brjod pa'i me 'di rab tu 'bar ba yin //
analyzed: lto ba khengs pa brjod pa'i me 'di rab tu 'bar ba yin //
translated: is filled with the fire of this expression.

original: drang srong min pa'i bshad pa'i 'dam rdzab shin tu chen po las //
analyzed: drang srong min pa'i bshad pa'i 'dam rdzab shin tu chen po las //
translated: From this very great swamp of non-sage explanations,

original: rgyal ba rnams ni skyed mdzad zhi ba 'byung gnas kyis ni gdon par byas //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams ni skyed mdzad zhi ba 'byung gnas kyis ni gdon par byas //
translated: The Victorious Ones, the creators, the peaceful, the sources, have made it known.

analyzed: rtog ge drug kyang shes shing rig byed kyis rtsub bram ze rnams dang rtsod pa las ni rnam par rgyal //
translated: Having understood the six logics, and having won the debate with the Brahmins who are harsh with the Vedas,

original: snyan dang gas dam pa brtsams pa'i yon tan 'di rnams kyis ni skabs su gyur la 'bras bu ci zhig yin //
analyzed: snyan dang gas dam pa brtsams pa'i yon tan 'di rnams kyis ni skabs su gyur la 'bras bu ci zhig yin //
translated: What is the fruit of this occasion, which is endowed with these qualities, the composition of this excellent treatise?🔽When one who is familiar with the three baskets also becomes

analyzed: gal te sde snod gsum la goms pa gang gi tshe na rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yum gsum la yang ni //
translated: unobstructed in the perfection of wisdom, and in the three mothers of the perfect Buddha,

original: thogs med pa ni pha rol phyin tshul gal te gang du 'phags pa klu sgrub bzhed pa yang //
analyzed: thogs med pa ni pha rol phyin tshul gal te gang du 'phags pa klu sgrub bzhed pa yang //
translated: and in the way of the Ārya Nāgārjuna,

analyzed: bdag cag gis ni blo yis byas pa'i ngo mtshar rnams kyis rig pa rnams la mtha' yang med pa la //
translated: the knowledge of those who have done this wonder with their minds is endless.

original: gang dang gang du yang ni gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi yang bde bar grogs po rnams ni rnyed //
analyzed: gang dang gang du yang ni gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi yang bde bar grogs po rnams ni rnyed //
translated: Wherever there are two, three, or four friends, they are easily found.

original: srid pa gzhan yang rgya che ba la 'bad pa chen po rnams kyis blo dang ldan par byas pa ni //
analyzed: srid pa gzhan yang rgya che ba la 'bad pa chen po rnams kyis blo dang ldan par byas pa ni //
translated: And other existences, vast and extensive, are made intelligent by great effort.

original: gcig gam gnyis kyang min te yongs su log nyid kyis kyang nang gi bdag nyid rig pa shes pa rnams //
analyzed: gcig gam gnyis kyang min te yongs su log nyid kyis kyang nang gi bdag nyid rig pa shes pa rnams //
translated: But not one or two, even by complete reversal, do the wise know the inner self.

original: bdag gi bshad pa yang dag don gyis bsdus la gang zhig mi gus pa ;
analyzed: bdag gi bshad pa yang dag don gyis bsdus la gang zhig mi gus pa ;
translated: My explanation, too, is gathered up by the true meaning. But whoever is disrespectful

analyzed: / nga rgyal gyis ni skye bo ngan pa sun dbyung bar ni mi nus te //
translated: cannot refute the evil person with pride.

original: glang chen gtso bo'i mche ba gnyis ni bsnyon chu'i thigs pa sna tshogs can //
analyzed: glang chen gtso bo'i mche ba gnyis ni bsnyon chu'i thigs pa sna tshogs can //
translated: The two tusks of the chief elephant are various water drops.

original: su zhig gis ni lag pa'i stobs kyis kun nas gdon par yang ni nus //
analyzed: su zhig gis ni lag pa'i stobs kyis kun nas gdon par yang ni nus //
translated: And who is able to pull them out with the strength of his hands?

original: dpung rgyan dang ni gdu bu gtor cig dbang phyug chen pos reg pa'i gor ma 'dren byed pa //
analyzed: dpung rgyan dang ni gdu bu gtor cig dbang phyug chen pos reg pa'i gor ma 'dren byed pa //
translated: Throw off the armlet and bracelet, the great lord's touch, the eye-leading one.

original: blon po gser gyi 'od kyis bslus pa tha dad du ma rnams kyis dor bar ma byed cig / dka' thub drag po rnams ni byas nas lha rnams bsten zhing gang zhig 'di ni sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: blon po gser gyi 'od kyis bslus pa tha dad du ma rnams kyis dor bar ma byed cig / dka' thub drag po rnams ni byas nas lha rnams bsten zhing gang zhig 'di ni sgrub byed pa //
translated: Having practiced severe austerities, the gods are served, and this is accomplished.

original: gang gis reg pas kyang ni lcags kyi phung po gser du bsgyur bas ngo mtshar don du 'byung //
analyzed: gang gis reg pas kyang ni lcags kyi phung po gser du bsgyur bas ngo mtshar don du 'byung //
translated: By whom, through mere contact, even a mass of iron is transformed into gold, and so becomes a source of wonder.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di bshad pas ni @320a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di bshad pas ni @320a * //
translated: By the explanation of this Blessed Perfection of Wisdom,

original: thob pa'i dge rnams kyis //
analyzed: thob pa'i dge rnams kyis //
translated: by the virtues obtained,

analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje gdan dang nye bar gang tshe 'dir ni mgon po byams pa rang nyid kyis //
translated: when the glorious Vajrāsana, near here, by the protector Maitreya himself,

analyzed: skyes bu khyu mchog n'a ga ge sar gsar pa'i shing gi grib ma rnams la ngal bso nas //
translated: the bull among men, resting in the shade of a fresh ironwood tree,

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni smon lam byas nas de tshe nges par byang chub thob gyur cig / mi yi dbang pos brten cing btud pa'i phyags mas phyag dar legs par byas pa de yis ni //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ni smon lam byas nas de tshe nges par byang chub thob gyur cig / mi yi dbang pos brten cing btud pa'i phyags mas phyag dar legs par byas pa de yis ni //
translated: Having made a prayer for perfect enlightenment, at that time may I certainly attain enlightenment.

original: zhabs dang nye ba'i pad ma'i rdul ni ring por bskrad pas sdang ba med la 'tsho ba po //
analyzed: zhabs dang nye ba'i pad ma'i rdul ni ring por bskrad pas sdang ba med la 'tsho ba po //
translated: By that broom of bowing and bending to the lord of men, well sweeping away the dust of feet and the dust of the lotus of his feet,🔽I, who am free from hostility, will live.

original: mi yi bdag po r'a ma p'a las sa skyong mdzad pa'i gnas kyi mu tig phreng ba ni //
analyzed: mi yi bdag po r'a ma p'a las sa skyong mdzad pa'i gnas kyi mu tig phreng ba ni //
translated: The garland of pearls of the place of the king of men, Rāmapāla,🔽I, the glorious king, will place in Jagaddala.

original: dpal ldan rgyal po dza gad ta lar gnas par byed pa bdag gis rnam bshad 'di byas so //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyal po dza gad ta lar gnas par byed pa bdag gis rnam bshad 'di byas so //
translated: This explanation is made by me.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i rnam par bshad pa man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
translated: The explanation of the noble Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines, called Following the Instructions, is completed.

original: // /'di'i gzhung tshad ni sha lo ka stong phrag brgyad do //
analyzed: // /'di'i gzhung tshad ni sha lo ka stong phrag brgyad do //
translated: The length of this text is eight thousand ślokas.

original: dpal ldan nga rgyal skyong gis rgyal srid mdzad pa'i lo bdun pa la dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi la dpal byang chub chen po'i lha khang du bris pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan nga rgyal skyong gis rgyal srid mdzad pa'i lo bdun pa la dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes bzhi la dpal byang chub chen po'i lha khang du bris pa'o //
translated: In the seventh year of the reign of the glorious and proud king, on the fourth day of the middle month of winter, it was written in the glorious temple of the Great Enlightenment.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa lang+ka ka de ba dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas kyis dpal sgye'u ri'i drung du chos skor dben pa'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa lang+ka ka de ba dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas kyis dpal sgye'u ri'i drung du chos skor dben pa'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The Indian abbot Alankaradeva and the Tibetan translator, the monk Tsultrim Jungnay, translated it in the temple of the Dharma circle in the presence of the glorious Gyeyu.

original: sde snod gsum ni 'dzin byed pa /🔽gnyal gyi bri lha na bzhugs pa'i //
analyzed: sde snod gsum ni 'dzin byed pa / gnyal gyi bri lha na bzhugs pa'i //
translated: The one who holds the three baskets,🔽the spiritual friend Lodro Jungnay,

original: dge bshes blo gros 'byung gnas kyis //
analyzed: dge bshes blo gros 'byung gnas kyis //
translated: who resides in Nyal Drilha,

analyzed: zhu phul yon bdag mdzad nas ni //

original: dngos cag lo pan rnam gnyis kyis //
analyzed: dngos cag lo pan rnam gnyis kyis //
translated: we two, the Indian and Tibetan translators,

original: rnam bshad 'di ni bsgyur pa yin //
analyzed: rnam bshad 'di ni bsgyur pa yin //
translated: have translated this commentary.

original: bsod nams 'di yis dus ni thams cad du //
analyzed: bsod nams 'di yis dus ni thams cad du //
translated: By this merit, may we always

analyzed: mchog gi sems can theg pa chen po'i rigs //
translated: be supreme beings, of the Mahayana lineage,🔽able to dispel the sufferings of the world,

original: 'jig rten pa yi sdug bsngal sel nus shing //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi sdug bsngal sel nus shing //
translated: and,

original: nad med rnam par 'tshe med 'byung gyur cig / sh'akya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pa'i theg pa mchog gi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa 'dis mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha dang ma sngon bu 'gro bar byas pa'i sems can gyi phung bo ma lus pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig /'grel pa 'di rting pa lo ts'a bas snga mor bsgyur yang phyis gzhan la ma 'phel bas /
analyzed: nad med rnam par 'tshe med 'byung gyur cig / sh'akya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pa'i theg pa mchog gi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa 'dis mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha dang ma sngon bu 'gro bar byas pa'i sems can gyi phung bo ma lus pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig /'grel pa 'di rting pa lo ts'a bas snga mor bsgyur yang phyis gzhan la ma 'phel bas /
translated: By the merit that I, the Śākya bhikṣu called Śīlapālita, have gained from this gift of the Dharma, which follows the supreme vehicle, may it be the cause for the attainment of the fruit of unexcelled wisdom by my preceptor, my teacher, my father, my mother, and all sentient beings who have been my parents in the past.🔽Although this commentary was translated long ago by Rinchen Zangpo, it did not spread to others later on.

original: sngar dpe phyi ma rnyed pa las phyis bla ma chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag dpe rgya yig gi nang nas /
analyzed: sngar dpe phyi ma rnyed pa las phyis bla ma chos kyi rgyal po'i phyag dpe rgya yig gi nang nas /
translated: Later, from among the books in the hands of the guru Chökyi Gyalpo,

original: dge bshes cog ro ston gzhon gyis rnyed nas bris pa'o /
analyzed: dge bshes cog ro ston gzhon gyis rnyed nas bris pa'o /
translated: the spiritual friend Chokro Lüi Gönpo found this text and wrote it down.
